name: Cook the Book: Guava Bellini
description: Photograph from Luiz Castro on Flickr The bellini is one classy cocktail. The simple mix of prosecco and peach puree has been around for a while, originating sometime between 1934 and 1948 at the historic Harry's Bar in Venice. The...
recipeIngredient: 4 to 6 ounces chilled Champagne or dry sparking wine

recipeInstructions.text: Gently mix the puree and ginger juice in a Champagne flute. Slowly add the Champagne. Stir gently. Garnish with raspberries and serve.
Note: To make ginger juice, grate fresh ginger using a cheese grater, then use your fingers to squeeze the juice from the pulp. Discard the grated ginger pulp.
